title: karuNa jUDa
sahitya:
karuNa jUDa ninnu nammina vADanugadA inta parAkElanamma


anupallavi

  sarasijAsana mAdhava sanunata caraNA brhannAyaki vEgamE 


caraNam 1    dIna janAvana mUrtini nIvani nEnu ninnu neranammitini
gAna vinOdini ghana nibha vENi kAmita phaladA samayamidE 
 caraNam 2    nI mahima atishayambulanu nentani nE jeppudunu O lalitA
hEmapAngi himagiri putri mahEshvari girIsha ramaNi nI 
 caraNam 3    shyAmakrSNa  paripAlini shUlini sAmaja gamanA kundaradanA
tAmasambu iTu sEyaka nA paritApamulanu pariharincina nIvu
